S.FORM: kakiliman takulahay a tayu' hican mukan takulahay a tayu' sapiselep tu duka, miedap mikelul tu baeket nu udip! Hican muka, iyaan muka kya kapah? "takulahay a tayu'" enemh ku sakapahay, nuayawan muka muucul kaku adihn kinacudad, ina limaay a binacadan amana pitiyung pikan yu. , , 6 , 5 nilaculan kapahay apsing sapaekeng pakatineng nu ayawan tusa ademiad. silemuden ni lin in si kumusilemeday. 2 takulahay a tayu' miedap tui dang pakay ni I ulat, misakapah tu nikatentenan amasaupu ku idang paculil tuidang, mucuduh tu butuka apalasit tu besi, muputun tu manganganay a sipaudip, mupulul tupalemang sananay a palakal ak amala silebawa, mahida u sawawaan a taliw. , , . takuliyaway atayu' capi nunamihcaan u sakanamuhan nu sapaekeng tu udip a kakanen. Sakamusa ku kanpuyaku u takuliyaway atayu' miedap tui dang pakakapah sa, namateltel mibuliyas tu nikasaupu nu idang sa, mucuduh tu butuka apalasit tu besi, muputun tu manganganay a sipaudip, muputun tu manganganay a sipaudip, mupulul tupalemang sananay a palakal ak amala silebawa, mahida u sawawaan a taliw. . , , . takuliyaway atayu' upasakapah pina? takuliyaway atayu' yaan mika? Hacivan kunikan kya kapah, takuliyaway atayu' idaw ku milaecusay haw ? mahicaay atademaw laecus muka tu takuliyaway atayu'? takuliyaway atayu' atu sumanahay a tayu' wiyca ku cay kalecad? takuliyaway atayu' hican musalami'? inacuda ladayen kita miasip. . takuliyaway atayu'? idaw ku kapah enem akakapahan adihan itamay. 6 takuliyaway atayu'idaw kuduma anganganu paw tin siang han, u lamit ilangen malaapuk malatakuliyaway a apuk u ka li han, usanek akenek aledah tu adidi', idaw ku lala' a sanek. takuliyaway atayu' idaw ku "takuliyaway atayu' a su" hananay sapaculi tu yu madada' kuduka miedap miselep tu kidemu, metalaw tu gang, kapah cay kaungang ku tangah idaw ku kapah. takuliyaway atayu'idaw ku " ci cang pay cen apaayyuay a sadan sakamu sa, takuliyaway atayu' idaw ku takuliyaway atayu' a su kyu icelang pakakapah tu mada'da' paculi tu sidada'ay kapah sa, utatengaay ani kingkiwan sa idaw ku enemay a kapah sa. . , , , . siheci tu enemay a kapah muputun tu nikadada' ; makayni "Amilika nu maudipay nu aadupan nu kigicu nikingkiwan akitidaan NCBI" tatenga nikingkiwan, u takuliyaway atayu' a su miedap miputun tu nikadada', mikelil tu mahaymaway a imelang a sakatalawan, u waneng aimilang, uidang, usingki nu udip,sawada' aimelang atu bala aimelang. 6 : 1. (NCBI) , , , . sapisinanut tu mapuut ku idang nu omelang. takuliyaway atayu' a sumiedap tu culil nu idang atu banges cay lalebawa, pasinanut tu atekak nu caculilan nu idang, mikaph tu culil nu idang mikelul tu laecusay a sapisinanut tui dang nu balucu' takuliyaway atayu' a su miedap tu kasida'da' tu banges, misinanut ut kaatekak nu idang, miedap tu nikaliyut nu idang i udiudipan, miselep tu laecusay a simal ni udip LDL anikakapah, pakay ni I idang nu udip idaw ku niadingan. 2. misinanut tu nikatineng atu maselep atu maapa ku tangah. , . takuliyaway atayu' a su cidek sa mucucuk tui dang nu mikawaay tu punu', misumad tu salengacay abu masaupu ilabu nu punu', mikalul tu nikaapa nu tangah aimelang, mikelul tu duka nu punu'. "Amilika nu babalaki a imelang a nisulitan" nikingkiwan tu imelangay idaw ku kamu, tudedemiad kinatusa mukan tu takuliyaway atayu' a su siwabataan a haw ke, tulin sa sabaw tu walu a bulad , miedap tu musumad tu nikaapa nu tangah a tademaw miedap tu sapidateng atu sapiciwi. Tatenga nikingkiwan takuliyaway atayu' a su sapisumad tu sapaculi tu lacusay a bali micidek musumad tu tangah anikadada', mihay maw tu katineng patasasa. 3. sapisinanut tu sawada' nu gang atu sapaculi tu gang. , . 90 18 . . sapisinanut tu sawada' nu gang atu sapaculi tu gang. takuliyaway atayu' a su taneng muketun tu gang a si paw namakayniay ku yiyu, pakayni mipuut tu culil nu ngang a siyaw su, baluhay aiding, makapuut tu niculil nu gang amalakalak, macunus ku imelang mangaleb satu yu. 4. mukan tu sapaculi tu masaupu ku idang atademaw atu cayay katatudung nu idang a tademaw . , , . takuliyaway a tayu' idaw ku sapaculi tu idang, micunus tu masaatilad ku idang a kapah, alahican sa maidang ku labu, sisa mamin namin namicician amanapikan yu amana palecad muka tu cacanan a sapaiyu atu mibelihay tu idang asapaiyu, mipuutay tu adidiay a idang asapaiyu, atu a se pi lin amana palamel amukan ,mangaleba ku kasaatilad nu idang mangaleba ku kani katahekal nu idang yu. 1. . , . si muni'ay ku sawad atademaw takuliyaway tayu' abulabul miduhepi micidek ku adad,anu yadah ku nikan adadaku bili' mapiyas muta mamuni' kusawada sibaetu yu idaw ku laecus . 2. sibaetu ku buwahatu besi atademaw. , , , . takuliyaway idaw ku 2 nu cikah sa anu talakaw sa mikawaw micalilaw tu buwidaw ku baetu,ah .idaw ku nipikingkiw, utakuliyaway a tayu' micunus tu isi' nu bulabul. kyu sibaetu ku buwah , anu siadadaya tu besi atademaw amana pikan , asibaetu ku besi amapuut ku caculilen nu besi . 3. 2 . . u takuliyaway a tayu' paudip tu nikasaatilad nu idang, paculi tu kasaupu nu idang, metalaw anu yadah katahekal nu idang,kyu u tatayna acabay anu mabulad kapah imahini mukan sa. 4. anu mabulad . . sibiliay, mahkamusapiliay 5. , namakayni i nisulitan 2008 amihcaan kanpuyaku mikingkiway sakamusa, paudip tui dang milawpes tu kasaupu nu idang sa, mabulad sa kapah ku takuliyaway a tayu'akanen, nika makai tu suluy cay pikabit sa.kyu mahka sibili' milungucay maydih asibili atatayna sa amana pikan. 2008 , . . takuliyaway a tayu'paculi tu da'da'miedap paculil tu udip, mipuut tun gang atu maapa ku tangah idaw ku kapah sa.nika idaw kuni kingkiwan tu mitudung tu laecus , anu hina maydih muta'mapiyas makaway ku banges sa. , , , , , , . "munayat miasip; muka takuliyaway a tayu'miedap mikelul tu nika kidemu, payasasa tu idang sa kukanpuyaku;ina lalimaay amana kapatelac ku nikan" ( : , : 5 ) takuliyaway a tayu'atu sumanahay a tayu'wica ku cay kalecad? takuliyaway a tayu'hinaadih tulu kuheni masakaput: nu sadingsinga takuliyaway a tayu',kasibaluan a takuliyaway a tayu', macelahay a takuliyaway a tayu' 3 : , , . kasibaluan a takuliyaway tayu', takuliyawaysadingsinga takuliyaway a tayu' takuliyaway tayu' kiyuay a takuliyaway tayu', takuliyaway tayu' usasanu lamit akulit mahida takuliyaway mahida u kama kalhida u kiyu akulit siadidi tu sumilaway atu landaway.u takuliyaway tayu'asu,kinayian kunu sumanahay a su, idaw ku talakaway a su nu takuliyaway tayu'makelul,uyadahay a takuliyaway tayu'u tung han, takuliyaway tayu'atu sumanahay a tayu'ucay kalecad isumanahay atu takuliyaway tayu'asu ku talakaway,nika takuliyaway tayu'nipaluma ku yadahay, madayum aca ku sapilacul kyu katuud ku palumaay. , , , , , , , , . takuliyaway a tayu' pana ku sapatelahnida? widasa u kali, kapah palamel tu mahicahicaay a akakanen. takuliyaway a tayu'micunus tu kapah nu udip,micunus tu sapaading tu udip, paculi tu nu bali'usakapahay akakanen ayda,kanaha u kali acacay idaw ku cacanan palamel han, misahemay palamelen tu hun nu takuliyaway a tayu'tamulak sakabien. , . , . , . takuliyaway tayu a nisahemay palasul tu:belac 2.5akupu, takuliyaway tayu abahun cacay a ngelab nanum 2.5 kupu. 1. : 2.5 , 1 , 2.5 . hini patelah belunen ku nanum atu hun nu takuliyaway tayu malamlamen, kya belunen kunisawsawan a belac.pacumuden i tinku muhudhud kapah tu. anu mamin tu mangaay tu sa hemhemen 10 asasulitan micunus tu asu'. u : . . 10 . 2. : 500 , 250 , 300 , 1 , . hican mupatelah banawen ku tamulak, cikciken duhepicen tu adidi, pacumuden i sahudhud katukuh mamuni', liwanen ku pudac nu tamulak kapah sakay udip. mangaayay atamulak,takuliyaway tayu'abahun,buling,palamelen pacumud tu sapi saheci akikay apalamlam mu niyul, sakapahen mibanaw ku lami' cikciken adiadidien, patayda inabi mungihngih pabangsis,palamelen tu mangaayay a tamulak cunusa tu adidiay a nanum,kiwakiwen paakuti'pacikahan tu adidi'kapah tu. takuliyaway tayu ahun malamelen tu tamulak yamangaayay atu buling paniylen I sapiheci akikay ya lami'tamlacen mibanaw cikciken tu adidi', ngihngihen pabangsi,belunen itamulak , cunusa tu adidi nu nanum misakaph tu nikana'na'pakulkulen sa, pacikahen tu adidi' kapah tu. : . , , . . . . namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan
